title: What matches this typeface?
content:
Hey Guys,  
I need a face that goes along with the numbers of this. (the "N" should be a clue)  
 [http://www.psyops.com/html/library\_crash.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015003256/http:/www.psyops.com/html/library_crash.html "http://www.psyops.com/html/library\_crash.html")

Unfortunately, this only comes in numerals. Can anyone list some please?

Thanks.
author: •Prakash Nair

comments.content:
There are 2 styles shown on the page you reference -- a serif and a sans. To match the serif, an obvious choice would be [Clarendon](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015003256/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=verity.search&font_categories_search=font_name_search&searchstr=clarendon&image.x=0&image.y=0). For a less obvious one, I'd look at [Egyptian 72](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015003256/http:/www.fontshop.com/?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&searchby=manufacturer&displayfontid=M.206.0.2).

Skylar

You might also find OXTAIL appealing for your task?

[http://www.psyops.com/html/spec\_oxtail.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015003256/http:/www.psyops.com/html/spec_oxtail.html "http://www.psyops.com/html/spec\_oxtail.html")
